sentences.english: In the theory of TCM the term "triple warmer" is also used to locate the body parts.
sentences.chinese: 在中医理论中，三焦也是划分躯体部位的一个概念。

sentences.english: Chinese medicine theory, the waist for kidney Fu, the main female reproductive and menstrual.
sentences.chinese: 中医理论中，腰为肾之腑，主生殖和女性月经。

sentences.english: Development and innovation of theory of TCM should sparkplug the standpoint of Yin -Ya ng equalitarian and c…
sentences.chinese: 中医理论的发展与创新，应倡导阴阳平等协调的观点。

sentences.english: TCM is characterized by the concept of organic wholeness and treatment based on syndrome differentiation.
sentences.chinese: 中医理论体系的基本特点是整体观念和辨证论治。

sentences.english: Theory of TCM, the waist of renal government office of reproductive and female menstruation, Lord.
sentences.chinese: 中医理论中，腰为肾之府，主生殖和女性月经。

sentences.english: Inheritance and innovation of Chinese medicine theory has been the world wide attention.
sentences.chinese: 如何将中医理论继承和创新已被世人广泛关注。

sentences.english: Yin-yang is involved in every aspect of traditional Chinese medicine's theoretical system.
sentences.chinese: 阴阳理论涉及传统中医理论体系的各个方面。

sentences.english: It deals with the philosophic origin of magnifying Yin and respecting Yang idea and its influence to the theory of TCM.
sentences.chinese: 讨论崇阴尊阳思想的哲学渊源及其对中医理论的影响。

sentences.english: Without theoretical support the modernization of TCM could only be like a flower as the broad leaved Epiphyllum briefly.
sentences.chinese: 没有中医理论的支持，中医药现代化只能是昙花一现。

sentences.english: Traditional Chinese medicine is a natural-philosophized medicine.
sentences.chinese: 中医理论是自然哲学性质的医学。

sentences.english: Can abuse blindly in no way, must act according to the Chinese medicine theory, dialectical selects.
sentences.chinese: 决不能盲目滥用，必须根据中医理论，辨证选用。

sentences.english: Chinese materia medica refers to medicinals used under the guidance of traditional Chinese medical theory.
sentences.chinese: 中药指在中医理论指导下应用的药物。

sentences.english: Viscera-state doctrine, as a basis of TCM theory, has come into being for more than two thousand years.
sentences.chinese: 藏象学说作为中医理论的基石已形成两千多年。
